Welcome to nesta_ds_utils’s documentation!¶

nesta_ds_utils is a collection of utility functions commonly used by the DAP team across projects.

Note

This project is under active development

  • loading_saving
    • file_ops
      • make_path_if_not_exist()
      • extractall()
    • S3

      • download_obj()
      • upload_file()
      • download_file()

    • datetime_ops
      • parse_date_string()
      • get_date_part()
  • viz
    • altair
      • formatting
        • setup_theme()
      • saving
        • save()
